post.author: Bran
post.content: Hi all. I'm in Korea now and in progress of emigration to Canada. I have been a member of Mr. Scott's site, but I have hardly visited there recently. Now I'm working as a web developer using java,jsp and so on. I wish to be a IT consultant. Anyway I am grateful to who made this site and gave me a chance to join this group. I'd be glad if I will be any help to you. Thanks.
post.title: First greeting
